table.name: Wilderness Encounters
table.caption: Wilderness Encounters
rows: A pack of six {@creature Wolf|XMM|Wolves} hunts the characters.
The characters come across a Reghed camp.
Weird lights flicker at night from the ruins of a giant settlement buried in the snow.
An earthquake shakes the ground, and a new steam vent opens at the characters' feet.
A {@creature Remorhaz|XMM} begins combat with a dwarf's bones and armor stuck in its teeth.
An {@creature Elemental Cultist|XMM} stalks the characters, seeking to take away their light, heat, and food.
An {@creature Adult White Dragon|XMM} circles overhead.
Psychic emanations from deep under the ice trouble the character's sleep.
A group of {@dice 2d6} {@creature Tough|XMM|Toughs} from the {@book Reghed Glacier|FRAiF|3|Reghed Glacier} spots the characters and approaches.
A character falls through thin ice into a mind flayer colony that lies just below the surface.
